scripts.watch:images: node -e 'require("chokidar").watch("src/images", {ignoreInitial:true}).on("all", (event, path) => { console.log(new Date().toISOString(), event, path); require("child_process").execSync("npm run copy:images", {stdio: "inherit"}); })'
scripts.build: esbuild src/js/main.js --bundle --outfile=dist/main.js --bundle npx posthtml src/index.html -o dist/index.html && cp -r src/scss dist/scss && npm run copy:images && npm run copy:components
scripts.dev: npm-run-all --parallel watch:scss watch:js watch:images watch:html serve copy:images copy:components
